nodes.bodyText: What's the goal of this new alias? Could it be described in the upgrade notes of the ticket?

Of course. It's to keep similar arguments to the Repository.PageProvider operation ( see https://github.com/nuxeo/nuxeo/blob/master/modules/platform/nuxeo-automation/nuxeo-automation-features/src/main/java/org/nuxeo/ecm/automation/core/operations/services/DocumentPageProviderOperation.java#L76)
